DISPLAY_COMMON.REQUEST_DISPLAY_FAIL: Failed to load the Display. This may be due to network conditions. Please try again later.
DISPLAY_COMMON.WHICH_ACCOUNT: Which account should {{app_name}} use to sync events?
DISPLAY_COMMON.ALWAYS_CAN_CHANGE: You can always change it later.
DISPLAY_COMMON.MANAGE_SPACE: Which calendar should {{app_name}} use to manage this space?
DISPLAY_COMMON.REMOTE_CALENDAR: This display will sync events with the remote calendar below:

DISPLAY_COMMON.WAY: Note: To reset the display, insert the paper clip into the pin-hole for ten seconds.
DISPLAY_COMMON.TIPS_TO: to modify global default template settings.
DISPLAY_COMMON.SENSOR_WAY: Note: long-press the Nodes button for 5 seconds to reset the sensor ( The indicator LED blinks).

HOME_COMMON.SEARCH_DISPLAY: Searching for nearby nodes in pairing mode:
HOME_COMMON.SEARCH_SENSOR: Searching for nearby sensor in pairing mode:
HOME_COMMON.CLICK_RIGHT: Click on [ Add Display ] in the top right corner.

SETUP_DISPLAY.ENTER_MODE_D42: Pull out the Display's battery insulation film. Then, poke the pin-hole button on the right side of the screen with a paper clip to let the Display enter into Pairing Mode.
SETUP_DISPLAY.ENTER_MODE_D75: poke the pin-hole button on the right side of the screen with a paper clip to let the Display enter into Pairing Mode.
SETUP_DISPLAY.ENTER_MODE_D29: Pull out the Display's battery insulation film. Then, poke the pin-hole button on the bottom side of the screen with a paper clip to let the Display enter into Pairing Mode.
SETUP_DISPLAY.ENTER_MODE_ALERT: While pairing, the display runs in low power mode; to ensure a smooth and secure connection,  please place close enough. Then you can draw them away upon paired.
SETUP_DISPLAY.AUTOMATIC_ADD: (Hub searches for nearby Displays in pairing mode and adds them automatically. Please make sure the distance between the Display and Hub is less than 5ft)
SETUP_DISPLAY.DISPLAY_WORD: Display shows "Trying to join a hub"
SETUP_DISPLAY.DISPLAY_WORD_insert: Display shows "Insert a paper clip to join a hub"
SETUP_DISPLAY.NOT_SEE: Did not see "Trying to join a Hub" on the bottom right corner of the screen
SETUP_DISPLAY.NOT_SEE_RESET: If you want to reset your display

ORGANIZATION_COMMON.CUSTIMIZE_LAYOUT: Customize how your organization appears across the apps.
ORGANIZATION_COMMON.IMAGE_SIZE: An avatar that identifies your organization， Use a square image of up to 1024px by 1024px.

ETHERNET_SETUP.HUB_BINDING_ERROR: Failed to link the Hub with your account, please contact us for help.
ETHERNET_SETUP.NOT_SETUP: hub is not in setup mode.
ETHERNET_SETUP.NOT_EXIST: The current device does not exist. Please rescan.

SELECT_SETUP_MODE.PLEASE_SELECT_MODE: Please select a type of network that the Hub will connect to:
SELECT_SETUP_MODE.SELECT_BLUETOOTH: This phone must have Bluetooth enabled:
SELECT_SETUP_MODE.SELECT_ETHERNET: Plug the hub into the ethernet cable and make sure your phone and hub are on the same network:

SETUP_DEVICE.WI-FI_SETUP_MODE_TEXT: After the hub flashes the breathing light, press and hold the hutton on the top of the hub until the blue breathing light flashes to enter the 'Setup Mode'.
SETUP_DEVICE.PRESS_WIFI_BUTTON: Press the setup button for five seconds
SETUP_DEVICE.PLUG_IN_HUB: Please plug in your hub and power it on.
SETUP_DEVICE.PLUG_IN_HUB_ETHERNET: Please plug in your hub and network cable and power it on.
SETUP_DEVICE.WIFI_PASS_INCORRECT: Connect Wi-Fi time out, please check the password and try again later.
SETUP_DEVICE.WIFI_USERNAME_PASS_INCORRECT: Connect Wi-Fi time out, please check the password or username and try again later.
SETUP_DEVICE.HOLD_WIFI_BUTTON: Hold and press the setup button for 5 seconds to enter the setup mode.
SETUP_DEVICE.HOLD_WIFI_BUTTON_BEFORE: (The button will not take effect until the buzzer sounds for 5 seconds after the first power-on.)
SETUP_DEVICE.HOLD_WIFI_BUTTON_ETHERNET: Press and hold the illustrated button for 5 seconds to enter the setup mode.
SETUP_DEVICE.ETHERNET_MODE_REMINDER: Make sure your phone and hub are on the same local area network. Do not enable LAN to LAN client isolation on the router.
SETUP_DEVICE.OPEN_BLUETOOTH: Please turn on the Bluetooth option on the phone first.
SETUP_DEVICE.SUBMIT_DEVICE_INFO_FAIL: Failed to submit data! This may be due to network conditions. Please check your network and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNECT_NETWORK_FAIL: Failed to connect Internet, Please try again later.
SETUP_DEVICE.FIND_NO_DEVICE: Cannot find the Hub nearby, please re-setup the Hub and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.NOT_SELECT_DEVICE: You must select one of the Hubs. Please try again
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNECT_DEVICE_FAIL: Unable to connect the Hub. Please move closer to the Hub and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.STATUS_PROBLEM: Failed to acquire Hub status. Please move closer to the Hub and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.GET_WIFIINFO_FAIL: Failed to acquire  Wi-Fi list. Please move closer to the Hub and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.SEND_WIFIINFO_FAIL: Failed to transmit  Wi-Fi info. Please move closer to the Hub and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNECT_WIFI_FAIL: Failed to connect the Hub to Wi-Fi, please double check the SSID, Wi-Fi password, and try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNECT_INTERNET_FAIL: Failed to connect the Hub to Internet, please  try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNECT_SERVICE_FAILURE: Unable to connect SyncSign Cloud Service. Please contact us for help
SETUP_DEVICE.ACCESS_KEY_EXPIRED: Identity information expired, please log in again
SETUP_DEVICE.DEVICE_NOT_EXIST: There is a glitch in the cloud service. Please contact us with your Hub's serial number.
SETUP_DEVICE.BIND_FAIL: Failed to link the Hub with your account. Please contact us for help
SETUP_DEVICE.CONNRCT_WIFI_TIMEOUT: Connecting to Wi-Fi timed out, please try it again.
SETUP_DEVICE.INITIALIZE_DEVICE_FAIL: Your Hub is connected to Wi-Fi, but fail to load device information. Please make sure App and the device are connected to the Internet and setup again.
SETUP_DEVICE.SETING_UP_DEVICE: Please wait, we are setting up your device
SETUP_DEVICE.INTERNET_CONNECTED: Your Hub is connected to the Internet
SETUP_DEVICE.BIND_SUCCESS_INFORMATION: Hub is connected to the Wi-Fi, but fail to request device information. Please make sure your phone is connected to the internet and click
SETUP_DEVICE.PREPARE_SET_UP: Preparing to set up your Hub
SETUP_DEVICE.OPEN_PHONE_LOCATION_SERVICE: This App requires enabling the Location Info to access Bluetooth/BLE for scanning nearby Hubs. Would you like to jump to the setting page, and turn on the GPS/Location manually?
SETUP_DEVICE.APP_LOCATION_SERVICE: This App requires enabling the Location Permission to access Bluetooth/BLE for scanning nearby Hubs. Please hit 'Allow' if prompted. Rest assured, we don't collect the location-based information, and you can turn off Location Permission upon the setup completed.
SETUP_DEVICE.OPEN_APP_LOCATION_SERVICE: This App requires enabling the Location Permission to access Bluetooth/BLE for scanning nearby Hubs. However, it's not activated yet. Would you like to jump to the setting page and allow it manually?
SETUP_DEVICE.CONFIRM_APP_LOCATION_SERVICE: This App requires enabling the Location Permission to access Bluetooth/BLE for scanning nearby Hubs. Please make sure the GPS/Location is turned on, and Location Permission authorized.
SETUP_DEVICE.MAX_LENGTH: * The maximum length of Wi-Fi network name is 32 characters!
SETUP_DEVICE.USERNAME_MAX_LENGTH: * The maximum length of Wi-Fi network username is 64 characters!
SETUP_DEVICE.MUST_INPUT_PASSWORD: * A encrypted network requires a password
SETUP_DEVICE.MIN_LENGTH: * The minimum length of the password is 6 characters!
SETUP_DEVICE.MAX_PASSWORD_LENGTH: * The maximum length of the password is 64 characters!
SETUP_DEVICE.PLEASE_RETRY: Failed to config Wi-Fi. Incorrect password?
SETUP_DEVICE.REQUEST_DEVICE_INFO_FAIL: Failed to load device info. This may be due to network conditions. Please try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.REQUEST_INFORMATION: The Hub linked to your account. Loading device information...
SETUP_DEVICE.ADD_SUCCESS: Congrats! The Hub has been added to your device list successfully.
SETUP_DEVICE.24G_ONLY: The Hub connects to 2.4GHz WLAN only.
SETUP_DEVICE.SCAN_AROUND: Scanning for Wi-Fi around the Hub...
SETUP_DEVICE.DEVICE_NO_CONNECTED: Connect to device fail, please try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.DEVICE_NO_GET_WIFILIST: Device did not get the Wi-Fi list.
SETUP_DEVICE.POST_WIFI_INFO_FAILED: Send Wi-Fi info failed, please try again.
SETUP_DEVICE.WIFI_CONNECT_FAILED: Wi-Fi connection failure. password may be incorrect; please try again
SETUP_DEVICE.INTERNET_CONNECT_FAILED: Connect to internet failed, please try again
SETUP_DEVICE.CLICK_HERE: To bind the Hub with your account, please input this code into Hub's web portal. Click here to see how to use a web browser to access the Hub's web portal.
SETUP_DEVICE.SENSOR_SUCCESS: As shown, you can activate the node by clicking the button. The node will be displayed on the home page

DOWNLOAD_APP.TITLE: Download SyncSign App
DOWNLOAD_APP.SCAN_QR_CODE: Scan the QR Code to Download the APP.
DOWNLOAD_APP.APP_STORE: Download SyncSign App from App store.

DOWNLOAD_APP.GO_TO_GOOGLE_PLAY: Go to Google Play on your Android device and search for 'SyncSign'

TEMPLATE_COMMON.SELECT_TEMPLATE_SUB: Choose a template as the default for your account.
TEMPLATE_COMMON.SET_TITLE: This setting can be overridden by selecting a specific template for each display.

MFA_COMMON.VERIFICATION_TEXT_CODE: The code cannot be empty and can only contain six digits.
MFA_COMMON.TWOFACTOR_TITLE: Two-step verification adds an extra layer of protection to your account. Whenever you sign in to the application, you'll need to enter both your password and also a verification code. This verification code will be sent to your mobile device via google authenticator app.
MFA_COMMON.CLOSE_TWOFACTOR: Are you sure you want to turn off the two-step verification?

PROVIDER.NAME: Name
PROVIDER.ENABLE_PROVIDER: Whether to enable the identity provider?
PROVIDER.CLOSE_PROVIDER: Are you sure you want to turn off the identity provider?

SENSOR_COMMON.BUTTON_TIPS_1: poke the pin-hole button on the right side of the screen with a paper clip to let the sensor enter into Pairing Mode.
SENSOR_COMMON.BUTTON_TIPS_2: until you see the blue LED blink
SENSOR_COMMON.SELECT_TIME_RANGE_TIPS: The default working time is all day, you need to set your working time here.
SENSOR_COMMON.ENTER_THE_CORRECT_TIME_RANGE: Please enter the correct time range
SENSOR_COMMON.WARN_TITLE: The current mailbox is not registered, please click Next, enter the verification code obtained in your existing mailbox, complete the verification.
SENSOR_COMMON.WARN_ERROR: The verification code expired ,or an error occurred. A verification code has been reissued. Please check the email address.

SENSOR_COMMON.SET_HUMIDITY_THRESHOLDS: (Set humidity thresholds for caution and alert ranges.)

SENSOR_SETTING_RESULT.TO_JUMP_MASSAGE: to jump to the interface to set the notification method, you can choose the notification method you like.

EXPORT_COMMON.COPY_MASSAGE: Or click 'Copy' to copy the download link and download through other methods
